ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of MONIQUE MERCIER, of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2020.
